message.body: Would you be able to Sell tickets fora concert this Saturday or is it too late notice
I can try but wouldn't be 100% quarenteed
Okay let me get back to you. Its for the script and one republic
We have 5 tickets. We were only going for Phuong but she can't now
Well ill post them on stub hub so decide and let me know
Okay. Phuong s gonna try to get a refund tomorrow morning but I really doubt she can
Most are not refundable. But text me tomorrow. You have the tickets in hand? Bec Ill need the barcodes in order to sell them
If you can post it that would be best. Phuong didn't call.

Yeah no refunds allowed. If you can sell them that would be great. They were 15 dollars each and if you sell them for more you can keep anything You make. I will.give you money.even if you don't sell them.for.more
Ok forward the email to me
At this point I won't be able to post them. I just left my dr office and now I'm at oogies. Friday's get crazy and I won't have time
Sorry I'm just getting this. It's okay. Thanks
